name: Dream On (Yosefkafa)
description:
Dream on is a small and emotional experience that puts the player in the shoes of a Piano player while telling him a little bit about his story through memories.

Credits: 

Game Design, Art & Programming by:
Yussef Kahatt.

Music by:
Luis Sayán

The FontStruction “Pixel-Art”
(http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/332304) by

This game was developed during the Global Game Jam
